## ThemeProvider() function

Provider to override the current [theme](./ui.theme.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ThemeProvider(
  props: StyledComponents.ThemeProviderProps<CustomTheme>
): JSX.Element
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                  | Description                                                                                                                   |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| props     | StyledComponents.ThemeProviderProps&lt;[CustomTheme](./ui.customtheme.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A [CustomTheme](./ui.customtheme.md) that will be deeply merged with the [current Theme](./ui.theme.md)<!-- -->, and children |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element
